Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 21st overall pick, by New Jersey in 1978...
Injured on 4/27/1981 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Traded from New Jersey to Plum Grove on 7/31/1981 (Going to NJ: RF J. Walser. Going to PG: 1B J. Hague, P D. Barta)...
Released by Plum Grove on 5/19/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/7/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1988, off Thomas Dawson (MAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1988, off Bradley Guillermo (MAN)...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Drove in 8 runs against Lynchburg on 7/28/1991...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Manchester on 8/27/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1991, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
